Package org.drip.sample.chisquare

Chi-Square Distribution Usage/Properties

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CentralChernoffBounds
    CentralChernoffBounds illustrates the Upper Chernoff Bounds for the Central Chi-squared Function.
    CentralExponentialCDFComparison
    CentralExponentialCDFComparison illustrates the Comparison of the CDF between the Exponential Distribution and the Central Chi-squared Distribution with 2 Degrees of Freedom.
    CentralMeasureEstimate
    CentralMeasureEstimate illustrates the Estimation of the Central Chi-squared Distribution Measures.
    CentralMomentsAboutZero
    CentralMomentsAboutZero illustrates the Computation of the non-Central Moments about Zero for the Central Chi-squared Function.
    CentralPDFEstimate
    CentralPDFEstimate illustrates the Construction and the Usage of a Central Chi-squared Distribution.
    CLTProxyMeasureEstimate
    CLTProxyMeasureEstimate illustrates the Estimation of Measures for a CLT Proxy for a Central Chi-squared Distribution.
    CLTProxyPDFEstimate
    CLTProxyPDFEstimate illustrates the Construction and the Usage of a CLT Proxy for a Central Chi-squared Distribution.
    FisherProxyPDFEstimate
    FisherProxyPDFEstimate illustrates the Construction and the Usage of a Fisher Proxy for a Central Chi-squared Distribution.
    WilsonHilfertyMeasureEstimate
    WilsonHilfertyMeasureEstimate illustrates the Estimation of Measures for the Wilson-Hilferty Transformation of a Central Chi-squared Distribution.
    WilsonHilfertyPDFEstimate
    WilsonHilfertyPDFEstimate illustrates the Construction and the Usage of the Wilson-Hilferty Normal Proxy for a Central Chi-squared Distribution.
